text:
Ordered the black pepper deer ğŸ¦Œ meat rice
Meat is tender, black pepper flavor a little overwhelming
But overall is still tasty
The price is $8

Had a very good meal here. Sambal Stingray with falling off flesh when scrapped. Nice sweet sambal sauce to perfectly go with rice.

For the lala, we went with the kum heung sauce for something different. Very fragrant and every morsel is coated in the goodness.

Fresh green veggie stir fried with mushrooms and garlic bits.

5/5 meal as always. Will be back again when I am around the area.

Friendly server uncle too! :)

Fried rice is horrible as alot of grains are as hard as a rock. I don't even understand how this place is still in operational. They cannot even get the basic of cooking right. The long pony tail lady keeps encouraging me to buy expensive stuff like seafood even though I said no already. Very disappointing Soon Huat
You will NEVER SEE ME AGAIN!!!!!
WASTED MY DINNER ON YOU.

Terrible service the ah seng middle age girl with VERY long pony tail anyhow accused me of not knowing how to cook when i found the fishâ€™s scale on my food, of course, naturally itâ€™d be weird to find that on my PORK RIBS RICE so i asked what this was? She arrogantly replied â€œFish scale lahâ€ and said to her worker that i donâ€™t know how to cook? Eh please. People know how to cook ofc, with hygiene lah. Very cute old auntie.

$15 of BBQ sotong. Didnt finish half the plate because it's so underwhelming.

1. They didnt remove the outer skin of the sotong properly, and it's a choking hazard bcus the skin is not easy to bite and it's long, thin and stretchy.

2. No taste in the meat. I thought it was steamed sotong instead of BBQ sotong. Maybe cos i didnt order the traditional sambal. Also, Where's the hotplate?

3. Price. Definitely not value for money.
